title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto, Vol. 1
description: There’s a new kid in town—and he’s kinda strange...Model student, beacon of inspiration, gentle spirit of guidance, and friend among friends—you name it, Sakamoto can do it. He’s your go-to-guy for any problem. But not everyone takes kindly to his unflappable persona, because, let’s face it, no one can truly be his match. Right?In the face of bullies, braggarts and killer bees, Sakamoto always keeps his cool. You haven’t heard of Sakamoto yet? Don’t worry, you will.
author: Nami Sano
